about_the_game:
Skyhigh is the second wonderful illustration from the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. The color palette of this puzzle is mainly in the gray and green sections with some small details that differ and provide variety. This fact, as well as many visually close details in the illustration, will make the assembly a challenging task.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.
detailed_description:
Skyhigh is the second wonderful illustration from the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. The color palette of this puzzle is mainly in the gray and green sections with some small details that differ and provide variety. This fact, as well as many visually close details in the illustration, will make the assembly a challenging task.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p Capable Card

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
